item.title: Protocol 6.2 Saga: Over-Formatting as Friction
item.description:
Protocol 6.2 Saga: Over-Formatting as Friction

Summary: Over-formatting in live chat became a diagnostic case study. Fix was precise operational definition (Tone Directive + Safety Lock), not more rules.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batch 3

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
